verses.verse: These <WH428> be the words<WH1697> which<WH834> Moses<WH4872> spoke<WH1696> unto<WH413> all<WH3605> Israel<WH3478> on this side<WH5676> Jordan<WH3383> in the wilderness,<WH4057> in the plain<WH6160> over against<WH4136> the Red<WH5489> sea, between<WH996> Paran,<WH6290> and Tophel,<WH8603> and Laban,<WH3837> and Hazeroth,<WH2698> and Dizahab.<WH1774>
(There are eleven<WH259> <WH6240> days<WH3117> journey from Horeb<WH4480> <WH2722> by the way<WH1870> of mount<WH2022> Seir<WH8165> unto<WH5704> Kadesh-barnea.)<WH6947>

And it came to pass<WH1961> in the fortieth<WH705> year,<WH8141> in the eleventh<WH6249> <WH6240> month,<WH2320> on the first<WH259> day of the month,<WH2320> that Moses<WH4872> spoke<WH1696> unto<WH413> the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> according unto all<WH3605> that<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> had given him in commandment<WH6680> <WH853> unto<WH413> them;

After <WH310> he had slain<WH5221> <WH853> Sihon<WH5511> the king<WH4428> of the Amorites,<WH567> which<WH834> dwelt<WH3427> in Heshbon,<WH2809> and Og<WH5747> the king<WH4428> of Bashan,<WH1316> which<WH834> dwelt<WH3427> at Astaroth<WH6252> in Edrei: <WH154>
On this side<WH5676> Jordan,<WH3383> in the land<WH776> of Moab,<WH4124> began<WH2974> Moses<WH4872> to declare<WH874> <WH853> this<WH2063> law,<WH8451> saying,<WH559>
The LORD<WH3068> our God<WH430> spoke<WH1696> unto<WH413> us in Horeb,<WH2722> saying,<WH559> Ye have dwelt<WH3427> long enough<WH7227> in this<WH2088> mount: <WH2022>

Turn <WH6437> you, and take your journey,<WH5265> and go<WH935> to the mount<WH2022> of the Amorites,<WH567> and unto<WH413> all<WH3605> the places nigh<WH7934> thereunto, in the plain,<WH6160> in the hills,<WH2022> and in the vale,<WH8219> and in the south,<WH5045> and by the sea<WH3220> side,<WH2348> to the land<WH776> of the Canaanites,<WH3669> and unto Lebanon,<WH3844> unto<WH5704> the great<WH1419> river,<WH5104> the river<WH5104> Euphrates.<WH6578>

Behold, <WH7200> I have set<WH5414> <WH853> the land<WH776> before<WH6440> you: go in<WH935> and possess<WH3423> <WH853> the land<WH776> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> swore<WH7650> unto your fathers,<WH1> Abraham,<WH85> Isaac,<WH3327> and Jacob,<WH3290> to give<WH5414> unto them and to their seed<WH2233> after<WH310> them.
And I spoke<WH559> unto<WH413> you at that<WH1931> time,<WH6256> saying,<WH559> I am not able<WH3201> <WH3808> to bear<WH5375> you myself alone: <WH905>
The LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> hath multiplied<WH7235> you, and, behold,<WH2009> ye are this day<WH3117> as the stars<WH3556> of heaven<WH8064> for multitude.<WH7230>
(The LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of your fathers<WH1> make you a thousand<WH505> times<WH6471> so many more<WH3254> as ye are, and bless<WH1288> you, as<WH834> he hath promised<WH1696> you!)
How <WH349> can I myself alone<WH905> bear<WH5375> your encumbrance,<WH2960> and your burden,<WH4853> and your strife?<WH7379>
Take <WH3051> you wise<WH2450> men,<WH376> and understanding,<WH995> and known<WH3045> among your tribes,<WH7626> and I will make<WH7760> them rulers<WH7218> over you.
And ye answered<WH6030> me, and said,<WH559> The thing<WH1697> which<WH834> thou hast spoken<WH1696> is good<WH2896> for us to do.<WH6213>

So I took<WH3947> <WH853> the chief<WH7218> of your tribes,<WH7626> wise<WH2450> men,<WH376> and known,<WH3045> and made<WH5414> them heads<WH7218> over<WH5921> you, captains<WH8269> over thousands,<WH505> and captains<WH8269> over hundreds,<WH3967> and captains<WH8269> over fifties,<WH2572> and captains<WH8269> over tens,<WH6235> and officers<WH7860> among your tribes.<WH7626>

And I charged<WH6680> <WH853> your judges<WH8199> at that<WH1931> time,<WH6256> saying,<WH559> Hear<WH8085> the causes between<WH996> your brethren,<WH251> and judge<WH8199> righteously<WH6664> between<WH996> every man<WH376> and his brother,<WH251> and the stranger<WH1616> that is with him.

Ye shall not<WH3808> respect<WH5234> persons<WH6440> in judgment;<WH4941> but ye shall hear<WH8085> the small<WH6996> as well as the great;<WH1419> ye shall not<WH3808> be afraid<WH1481> of the face<WH4480> <WH6440> of man;<WH376> for<WH3588> the judgment<WH4941> is God's:<WH430> and the cause<WH1697> that<WH834> is too hard<WH7185> for<WH4480> you, bring<WH7126> it unto<WH413> me, and I will hear<WH8085> it.
And I commanded<WH6680> you at that<WH1931> time<WH6256> <WH853> all<WH3605> the things<WH1697> which<WH834> ye should do.<WH6213>

And when we departed<WH5265> from Horeb,<WH4480> <WH2722> we went through<WH1980> <WH853> all<WH3605> that<WH1931> great<WH1419> and terrible<WH3372> wilderness,<WH4057> which<WH834> ye saw<WH7200> by the way<WH1870> of the mountain<WH2022> of the Amorites,<WH567> as<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> our God<WH430> commanded<WH6680> us; and we came<WH935> to<WH5704> Kadesh-barnea.<WH6947>
And I said<WH559> unto<WH413> you, Ye are come<WH935> unto<WH5704> the mountain<WH2022> of the Amorites,<WH567> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> our God<WH430> doth give<WH5414> unto us.

Behold, <WH7200> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> hath set<WH5414> <WH853> the land<WH776> before<WH6440> thee: go up<WH5927> and possess<WH3423> it, as<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of thy fathers<WH1> hath said<WH1696> unto thee; fear<WH3372> not,<WH408> neither<WH408> be discouraged.<WH2865>

And ye came near<WH7126> unto<WH413> me every one<WH3605> of you, and said,<WH559> We will send<WH7971> men<WH376> before<WH6440> us, and they shall search us out<WH2658> <WH853> the land,<WH776> and bring<WH7725> us word<WH1697> again<WH853> by what<WH834> way<WH1870> we must go up,<WH5927> and<WH853> into<WH413> what<WH834> cities<WH5892> we shall come.<WH935>
And the saying<WH1697> pleased me well:<WH3190> <WH5869> and I took<WH3947> twelve<WH8147> <WH6240> men<WH376> of<WH4480> you, one<WH259> of a tribe: <WH7626>
And they turned<WH6437> and went up<WH5927> into the mountain,<WH2022> and came<WH935> unto<WH5704> the valley<WH5158> of Eshcol,<WH812> and searched it out.<WH7270> <WH853>

And they took<WH3947> of the fruit<WH4480> <WH6529> of the land<WH776> in their hands,<WH3027> and brought it down<WH3381> unto<WH413> us, and brought<WH7725> us word<WH1697> again, and said,<WH559> It is a good<WH2896> land<WH776> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> our God<WH430> doth give<WH5414> us.
Notwithstanding ye would<WH14> not<WH3808> go up,<WH5927> but rebelled against<WH4784> <WH853> the commandment<WH6310> of the LORD<WH3068> your God: <WH430>

And ye murmured<WH7279> in your tents,<WH168> and said,<WH559> Because the LORD<WH3068> hated<WH8135> us, he hath brought us forth<WH3318> out of the land<WH4480> <WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> to deliver<WH5414> us into the hand<WH3027> of the Amorites,<WH567> to destroy<WH8045> us.

Whither <WH575> shall we<WH587> go up?<WH5927> our brethren<WH251> have discouraged<WH4549> <WH853> our heart,<WH3824> saying,<WH559> The people<WH5971> is greater<WH1419> and taller<WH7311> than<WH4480> we; the cities<WH5892> are great<WH1419> and walled<WH1219> up to heaven;<WH8064> and moreover<WH1571> we have seen<WH7200> the sons<WH1121> of the Anakims<WH6062> there.<WH8033>
Then I said<WH559> unto<WH413> you, Dread<WH6206> not,<WH3808> neither<WH3808> be afraid<WH3372> of<WH4480> them.

The LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> which goeth<WH1980> before<WH6440> you, he<WH1931> shall fight<WH3898> for you, according to all<WH3605> that<WH834> he did<WH6213> for<WH854> you in Egypt<WH4714> before your eyes;<WH5869>

And in the wilderness,<WH4057> where<WH834> thou hast seen<WH7200> how that<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> bore<WH5375> thee, as<WH834> a man<WH376> doth bear<WH5375> <WH853> his son,<WH1121> in all<WH3605> the way<WH1870> that<WH834> ye went,<WH1980> until<WH5704> ye came<WH935> into<WH5704> this<WH2088> place.<WH4725>
Yet in this<WH2088> thing<WH1697> ye did not<WH369> believe<WH539> the LORD<WH3068> your God,<WH430>

Who went<WH1980> in the way<WH1870> before<WH6440> you, to search you out<WH8446> a place<WH4725> to pitch your tents<WH2583> in, in fire<WH784> by night,<WH3915> to show<WH7200> you by what<WH834> way<WH1870> ye should go,<WH1980> and in a cloud<WH6051> by day.<WH3119>
And the LORD<WH3068> heard<WH8085> <WH853> the voice<WH6963> of your words,<WH1697> and was wroth,<WH7107> and swore,<WH7650> saying,<WH559>

Surely <WH518> there shall not one<WH376> of these<WH428> men<WH376> of this<WH2088> evil<WH7451> generation<WH1755> see<WH7200> <WH853> that good<WH2896> land,<WH776> which<WH834> I swore<WH7650> to give<WH5414> unto your fathers,<WH1>

Save <WH2108> Caleb<WH3612> the son<WH1121> of Jephunneh;<WH3312> he<WH1931> shall see<WH7200> it, and to him will I give<WH5414> <WH853> the land<WH776> that<WH834> he hath trodden<WH1869> upon, and to his children,<WH1121> because<WH3282> <WH834> he hath wholly<WH4390> followed<WH310> the LORD.<WH3068>
Also <WH1571> the LORD<WH3068> was angry<WH599> with me for your sakes,<WH1558> saying,<WH559> Thou<WH859> also<WH1571> shalt not<WH3808> go in<WH935> thither.<WH8033>

But Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Nun,<WH5126> which standeth<WH5975> before<WH6440> thee, he<WH1931> shall go in<WH935> thither:<WH8033> encourage<WH2388> him: for<WH3588> he<WH1931> shall cause<WH853> Israel<WH3478> to inherit<WH5157> it.

Moreover your little ones,<WH2945> which<WH834> ye said<WH559> should be<WH1961> a prey,<WH957> and your children,<WH1121> which<WH834> in that day<WH3117> had no knowledge<WH3045> <WH3808> between good<WH2896> and evil,<WH7451> they<WH1992> shall go in<WH935> thither,<WH8033> and unto them will I give<WH5414> it, and they<WH1992> shall possess<WH3423> it.
But as for you,<WH859> turn<WH6437> you, and take your journey<WH5265> into the wilderness<WH4057> by the way<WH1870> of the Red<WH5488> sea.<WH3220>

Then ye answered<WH6030> and said<WH559> unto<WH413> me, We have sinned<WH2398> against the LORD,<WH3068> we<WH587> will go up<WH5927> and fight,<WH3898> according to all<WH3605> that<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> our God<WH430> commanded<WH6680> us. And when ye had girded on<WH2296> every man<WH376> <WH853> his weapons<WH3627> of war,<WH4421> ye were ready<WH1951> to go up<WH5927> into the hill.<WH2022>

And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> unto<WH413> me, Say<WH559> unto them, Go not up,<WH5927> <WH3808> neither<WH3808> fight;<WH3898> for<WH3588> I am not<WH369> among<WH7130> you; lest<WH3808> ye be smitten<WH5062> before<WH6440> your enemies.<WH341>

So I spoke<WH1696> unto<WH413> you; and ye would not<WH3808> hear,<WH8085> but rebelled against<WH4784> <WH853> the commandment<WH6310> of the LORD,<WH3068> and went presumptuously up<WH5927> <WH2102> into the hill.<WH2022>

And the Amorites,<WH567> which dwelt<WH3427> in that<WH1931> mountain,<WH2022> came out<WH3318> against<WH7125> you, and chased<WH7291> you, as<WH834> bees<WH1682> do,<WH6213> and destroyed<WH3807> you in Seir,<WH8165> even unto<WH5704> Hormah.<WH2767>
And ye returned<WH7725> and wept<WH1058> before<WH6440> the LORD;<WH3068> but the LORD<WH3068> would not<WH3808> hearken<WH8085> to your voice,<WH6963> nor<WH3808> give ear<WH238> unto<WH413> you.
So ye abode<WH3427> in Kadesh<WH6946> many<WH7227> days,<WH3117> according unto the days<WH3117> that<WH834> ye abode<WH3427> there.
